segments.pli: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, appaṃ rattiyā supanti, bahuṃ jagganti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, these five sleep little at night, staying mostly awake.

segments.pli: Itthī, bhikkhave, purisādhippāyā appaṃ rattiyā supati, bahuṃ jaggati.
segments.en: A woman longing for a man.

segments.pli: Puriso, bhikkhave, itthādhippāyo appaṃ rattiyā supati, bahuṃ jaggati.
segments.en: A man longing for a woman.

segments.pli: Coro, bhikkhave, ādānādhippāyo appaṃ rattiyā supati, bahuṃ jaggati.
segments.en: A thief longing for their loot.

segments.pli: Rājā, bhikkhave, rājakaraṇīyesu yutto appaṃ rattiyā supati, bahuṃ jaggati.
segments.en: A king busy with his duties.

segments.pli: Bhikkhu, bhikkhave, visaṃyogādhippāyo appaṃ rattiyā supati, bahuṃ jaggati.
segments.en: A mendicant longing for freedom from attachment.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca appaṃ rattiyā supanti, bahuṃ jaggantī”ti.
segments.en: These five sleep little at night, staying mostly awake.”
